welcome_message_title: Welcome to Sao Sebastiao do Cai
welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Sao Sebastiao do Cai, a charming city known for its rich history and vibrant culture. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that this beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nossa Senhora de Fátima Aerodrome Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Nossa Senhora de Fátima Aerodrome Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Salgado Filho Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
